PERSONA:
michael is a 55-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he has some college education but no degree, and his income falls in the lower bracket, earning less than $30,000 per year.

michael identifies as an atheist and is unaffiliated with any religion. he never attends religious services. politically, he is hesitant to disclose his party affiliation or ideological leaning, preferring to keep those details private.

despite his moderate income, michael is an active internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not engage in volunteer work or community service activities.

michael is currently living with a partner, and they have been residing in the united states since birth. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously, making sure he is registered at his current address.

overall, michael values his privacy and independence. he maintains a moderate lifestyle, relying on the internet for information and entertainment while focusing on his personal relationships and responsibilities.
